text: @WhiteHouse But the only one that really works is the hydrochlolromoximine. Now that shit will cure anything. I got a bunion on my left toe and *BAM*.. gone. So #CoronaVirus is also gonna be gone. *Oh, and I don’t have any stock in that drug. Just letting you know. https://t.co/kTTd9iYZc8
